law.catch_line: Rights and privileges of directors of stabilization reserve fund.
law.text: No member of the board of directors of the stabilization reserve fund who is otherwise a public officer or employee shall suffer a forfeiture of his office or employment or any loss or diminution in the rights and privileges appertaining thereto, by reason of membership on the board of directors of the stabilization reserve fund.
law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 14, effective June 19, 1976.
